smells.name: FunctionMaxLength
smells.description: Function names should not be longer than the maximum set in the project configuration.

instances.message: Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: context.getSystemService(Context.NOTIFICATION_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to NotificationManager.
context.getSystemService(Context.NOTIFICATION_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to NotificationManager.
tokenId cannot be safely cast to String.
firebaseUser cannot be safely cast to FirebaseUser.
p0.value cannot be safely cast to Long.
p0.value cannot be safely cast to Long.
p0.getValue(PollutionData::class.java) cannot be safely cast to PollutionData.

smells.name: NewLineAtEndOfFile
smells.description: Checks whether files end with a line separator.

instances.message: The file ForceUpdateActivity.kt is not ending with a new line.

The file PollutionUser.kt is not ending with a new line.

smells.name: MaxLineLength
smells.description: Line detected that is longer than the defined maximum line length in the code style.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of ForceUpdateActivity.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of AlertNotifications.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of Authenticator.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of the class or object.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of IAuthenticator.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of IRealTimeDataBase.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.
This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: MayBeConst
smells.description: Reports vals that can be const val instead.

instances.message: POLLUTION_ALERT_NOTIFICATION_ID can be a `const val`.
OZONE_ALERT_NOTIFICATION_ID can be a `const val`.
ALERT_CHANNEL_ID can be a `const val`.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

smells.name: ExpressionBodySyntax
smells.description: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

instances.message: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: com.google.firebase.database.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
